column4: is there a minimal ubuntu distro I can put on a usb that'll let me fetch the rest of the pckages via the intertubes?
there's a minimal ISO ( see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/MinimalCD ) but I don't know how you'd get it on a USB.
that's good enogh i'll use usb-creator
I'm not sure that USB creator supports it, but it's worth a try I guess
